Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
About the role

Head of Automation Engineering is in charge of defining vision around quality and building the strategy, team, process, and tools to achieve it. You will be accountable for Technology, Delivery and People aspect of core Automation Engineering team; direct reports typically consist of engineering managers and senior ICs only. You will be collaborating with product teams and positively impacting them by holding them to high quality. You are someone who anticipates the creation of future verticals and works with stakeholders to kick off the work for these verticals, when necessary.

About the role

Head of Automation Engineering is in charge of defining vision around quality and building the strategy, team, process, and tools to achieve it. You will be accountable for Technology, Delivery and People aspect of core Automation Engineering team; direct reports typically consist of engineering managers and senior ICs only. You will be collaborating with product teams and positively impacting them by holding them to high quality. You are someone who anticipates the creation of future verticals and works with stakeholders to kick off the work for these verticals, when necessary.

lists.content:
• Works with engineering managers to define their team’s goals by clarifying and maintaining consistency with larger organisational goals
  • Stays aware of changes around the company to anticipate and prevent obstacles from hindering team performance
  •  Ensures that the right processes are established and followed to properly evaluate architectural and tools decisions for important projects and advises teams to improve execution
  • Influences senior leaders on quality automation strategy
  • Ensures technical designs are properly evaluated for important projects and advises teams to improve execution
  • Gives key input for the company for potential acquisition
  • Becomes key member and decision maker in the engineering leadership teamRepresents goals, metrics, and successes to senior leadership for all teams reporting into them
  • Works with and through managers to set team vision, mission, and strategy and the positive impact for the quality of our products
  • Uses negotiation and patience to collaborate with other senior leaders, ensuring progress and setting the example for others
  • Collaborates across product groups and disciplines to solve problems and resolve technical debates
  • Stays aware of changes around the company to anticipate and prevent obstacles from hindering team performance
  • Independently plans the growth of their organisation and scales the team
  • Participates in recruiting, focusing on  sourcing, selling, and closing offers for managers, senior ICs, and/or tech leads
  • Generally coaches managers and ICs reporting into them, for succession planning and growing the organisation
  • Mentors other senior engineers or managers on strategy, collaboration, influence, execution, and other aspects of leadership

• 10+ years of experience in automation engineeringExperience in heading automation engineering at a rapidly growing company
  • Experience in designing and implementation of complex concepts, practices and procedures within Automation Engineering domain
  • You have experience in building and leading teams. You can mentor and develop people
  • Demonstrated leadership abilities
  • Excellent written/verbal communication and facilitation skills for communicating at all levels
  • Fundamental understanding of first principles required to design and implement automation frameworks and tools
  • Thorough understanding of industry leading automation technologies (for mobile apps as well as backend) and extensive experience in leveraging these technologies to support business objectives
  • As someone with extensive experience in the automation engineering domain, you can define objectives and set goals and strategy to achieve it
  • You are a good listener and communicator
  • You collaborate with your cross-functional peers to understand their requirements and stack while also representing your’s
  • You lead by example, holding yourself and your team to high standards
  • You can drive large scale, company wise transformation, including the culture and mindset of a group to embrace new and improved ways of using technology
